00064 int ueac_execute_instruction(ueac_t *system_state) {
00065   enum {OFF,ON};
00066   int return_val=0;
00067 
00068 #ifndef LINUX
00069   int i;
00070   int probe_num;
00071 #endif 
00072   if (system_state->instruction.command_reg==UEAC_EXECUTE) {
00073     switch (system_state->instruction.instruction_type) {
00074     case UEAC_ALL_V:
00075 #ifndef LINUX
00076       for (i=0;i<25;i++) {
00077         if (lla_input_check(i,system_state)) {
00078           convert_a2d(I_CONVERSION,pin_data[i].filtered_result,&conversion_result,i);
00079           printf("0.%03d,",conversion_result.integer);
00080         }
00081         else {
00082           convert_a2d(V_CONVERSION,pin_data[i].filtered_result,&conversion_result,i);
00083           printf("%d.%02d,",conversion_result.integer,conversion_result.hundredth);
00084         }
00085       }
00086 #else 
00087       printf("UEAC_ALL_V ");
00088 #endif
00089       break;
00090     case UEAC_ALL_I:
00091 #ifndef LINUX
00092       for (i=0;i<25;i++) {
00093         if (lla_input_check(i,system_state)) {
00094           convert_a2d(I_CONVERSION,pin_data[i].filtered_result,&conversion_result,i);
00095           printf("-%d,",conversion_result.integer);
00096         }
00097         else {
00098           printf("%d,",system_state->pin_current[i]);
00099         }
00100       }
00101 #else 
00102       printf("UEAC_ALL_I ");
00103 #endif
00104       break;
00105     case UEAC_READ_V:
00106 #ifndef LINUX
00107       probe_num=((system_state->instruction.pin_y-1)*5)+(system_state->instruction.pin_x-1);
00108       if (lla_input_check(probe_num,system_state)) {
00109         convert_a2d(I_CONVERSION,pin_data[probe_num].filtered_result,&conversion_result,probe_num);
00110         printf("0.%03d,",conversion_result.integer);
00111       }
00112       else {
00113         convert_a2d(V_CONVERSION,pin_data[probe_num].filtered_result,&conversion_result,probe_num);
00114         printf("%d.%02d,",conversion_result.integer,conversion_result.hundredth);
00115       }
00116 #else 
00117       printf("UEAC_READ_V ");
00118 #endif
00119       break;
00120     case UEAC_READ_I:
00121 #ifndef LINUX
00122       probe_num=((system_state->instruction.pin_y-1)*5)+(system_state->instruction.pin_x-1);
00123       if (lla_input_check(probe_num,system_state)) {
00124         convert_a2d(I_CONVERSION,pin_data[probe_num].filtered_result,&conversion_result,probe_num);
00125         printf("-%d,",conversion_result.integer);
00126       }
00127       else {
00128         printf("%d,",system_state->pin_current[probe_num]);
00129       }
00130 #else 
00131       printf("UEAC_READ_I ");
00132 #endif
00133       break;
00134     case UEAC_WRITE:
00135 #ifndef LINUX
00136       probe_num=((system_state->instruction.pin_y-1)*5)+(system_state->instruction.pin_x-1);
00137       write_current(probe_num,system_state->instruction.value); 
00138       system_state->pin_current[probe_num]=system_state->instruction.value;
00139 #else 
00140       printf("UEAC_WRITE ");
00141 #endif
00142       break;
00143     case UEAC_LLA_ADD:
00144       lla_add(system_state);
00145 #ifndef LINUX
00146 #else 
00147       printf("UEAC_LLA_ADD ");
00148 #endif
00149       break;
00150     case UEAC_LLA_DISABLE:
00151       lla_disable(system_state);
00152 #ifndef LINUX
00153 #else 
00154       printf("UEAC_LLA_DISABLE ");
00155 #endif
00156       break;
00157     case UEAC_LLA_ENABLE:
00158       lla_enable(system_state);
00159 #ifndef LINUX
00160 #else 
00161       printf("UEAC_LLA_ENABLE ");
00162 #endif
00163       break;
00164     case UEAC_LLA_REPORT:
00165       if (lla_report(system_state,&lla_data)==0) {
00166         printf("-%d,%d,",lla_data.input,lla_data.output);
00167       }
00168       else {
00169         printf("*,*,");
00170       }
00171 #ifndef LINUX
00172 #else 
00173       printf("UEAC_LLA_REPORT ");
00174 #endif
00175       break;
00176     case UEAC_CAL:
00177 #ifndef LINUX
00178       current_output_calibration(&ueac_state);
00179 #else 
00180       printf("UEAC_CAL ");
00181 #endif
00182       break;
00183     case UEAC_RST:
00184 #ifndef LINUX
00185       printf("OK\n\r");
00186       system_reset();
00187 #else 
00188       printf("UEAC_RST ");
00189 #endif
00190       break;
00191     case UEAC_LON:
00192 #ifndef LINUX
00193       led_screen_enable=1;
00194 #else 
00195       printf("UEAC_LON ");
00196 #endif
00197       break;
00198     case UEAC_LOF:
00199 #ifndef LINUX
00200       led_screen_enable=0;
00201       clear_led_screen();
00202 #else 
00203       printf("UEAC_LOF ");
00204 #endif
00205       break;
00206     }
00207 #ifndef LINUX
00208     printf("OK\n\r");
00209 #else 
00210     printf("OK\n");
00211 #endif
00212   }
00213   else {
00214 #ifndef LINUX
00215     printf("NOK\n\r");
00216 #else 
00217     printf("NOK\n");
00218 #endif 
00219     return_val=1;
00220   }
00221   system_state->instruction.command_reg=UEAC_READY;
00222   return(return_val);
00223 }
00224 
00225 int lla_input_check(char chan,ueac_t *system_state) {
00226   int return_val=0;
00227   if (system_state->lla_input&((unsigned long)(0x00000001<<chan))) {
00228     return_val=1;
00229   }
00230   return (return_val);
00231 }
00232 
00233 void report_instruction(ueac_t *system_state) {
00234   
00235   printf("xin=%d ",system_state->instruction.pin_x);
00236   printf("yin=%d ",system_state->instruction.pin_y);
00237   printf("xout=%d ",system_state->instruction.pin_x_alt);
00238   printf("yout=%d\n",system_state->instruction.pin_y_alt);
00239   printf("descriptor=%d ",system_state->instruction.lla_descriptor);
00240   printf("function=%d ",system_state->instruction.lla_function);
00241   printf("period=%d\n",system_state->instruction.lla_period);
00242 }
